prompts: Create a legendary water-type Pokemon with sleek blue skin and unique fins.
I want a majestic Pokemon that embodies the ocean's power and has a streamlined design.
Generate an aquatic creature with a vibrant blue hue and striking white patterns.
Make a Pokemon resembling a whale, known for its massive size and oceanic abilities.
Imagine a mythical creature that controls the seas, featuring a deep blue body and red accents.
Design a powerful water-type Pokemon that showcases agility and strength in battles.
Give me an impressive water Pokemon that has a sleek body and impressive swimming capabilities.
